body_text:
Is Vampire Knight still being written? I bought 17 volumes of the manga from Madman in Australia, and only recently did I get an email from them advertising an 18th volume.
I thought Vampire Knight had ended, but if volumes are still being released in Japan, then it'll take some time before they are translated and reprinted so it's ongoing. However, if it's finished in Japan then new English volumes are just catching up to the end, either way the translation is slow (I bought the 17 volumes back in March this year during a sale).
So I'm wondering: Is Vampire Knight still being written or has it finished in Japan?

How well did vampire knight sell? A rather straightforward question, but how well did both the anime and manga sell?  Where they both popular?  What was the account if units sold for the anime each season?  I'm trying to get an all around view of how popular the show/manga was.
